_header: Mistress Dorothy this is your book
_description: Verses addressing the recipient of the book, one Dorothy — one couplet

HunHM136.Transcription:
Mystrys Dorethe this is yovr boke Who wovll you denyCavle me to re
                    corde I wyll saye [they] ly
HunHM136.Note:
Added to top margin by a hand of the sixteenth century; symbols or
                    crossed-out text where ‘they’ substituted in second
                    line.
HunHM136.Editions:
Hanna,  Ralph,
                        ed.  
             “The Index of Middle English Verse and Huntington Library Collections: A
                Checklist of Addenda.” 
             Publications of the Bibliographical Society of America
         74 (1980): 235-58: 249.
